programme.desc: Lucas Vaughn es un padre divorciado cuya hija padece de una enfermedad grave. programme.desc: El asesino en serie Arthur Shawcross cuenta un montón de historias sobre su vida antes de empezar a matar. Abusos, zoofilia, canibalismo... pero, ¿es cierto algo de eso? Y si no, ¿qué moldeó su trayectoria de "Artie Bicho Raro" a asesino? Puede que se le conociera por matar mujeres a lo largo del río Genesee de Rochester, pero su primer asesinato fue años antes y la culminación de años de oscuras fantasías.

programme.title: Así en el barrio como en el cielo
Nada Personal
programme.desc: Nada Personal es una serie que trae Discovery Channel para Latinoamérica donde asesinos a sueldo son contratados para matar sin piedad.La serie tipo documental Nada Personal es presentada por Steve Schirippa, conocido por la serie de mafiosos “Los Soprano”. En este programa se verán historias verídicas de asesinatos hechos por contrato.En cada capítulo de la serie, se narra la historia de un trabajo profesional que trata de cómo se contacta, las instrucciones dadas al asesino para llevar a cabo las peticiones del cliente.

programme.title: Broken Ties
programme.desc: A pregnant homeless woman living in Tel Aviv is recruited against her will by a police investigator to serve as an undercover agent in an international crime investigation involving the trafficking of newborn babies. (Repeat).

programme.title: Broken Ties
programme.desc: As details come to light about Haya's mysterious past, Ami tries to convince her to cooperate with the police. Audrey, a Spanish detective, manages to get in touch with a man who traffics babies on the dark net. (Repeat).

programme.title: Broken Ties
programme.desc: Just when it seems Haya will agree to cooperate with the police in exchange for getting to meet her long-lost brother, someone tries to eliminate her. The baby trafficker reconnects with Audrey. (Repeat).

programme.title: R.M.N.
programme.desc: After quitting his job in Germany, Matthias goes back to his home village in Romania. He's pulled back into the daily life of his family members. He gets closer to his son Rudi, hoping to improve his education and rectify his beliefs about the world. He also reconnects with his ex Csilla who runs a factory busy with conflicts. (Repeat).

programme.title: Biosphere
programme.desc: Ray and Billy are best friends living in a carefully constructed, self-sufficient dome shelter in a post-apocalyptic world. Fitted with a hydroponic garden and a plentiful pond, the shelter supplies them with fresh vegetables and fish. When the fish begin dying mysteriously, Ray and Billy face an uncertain future. (Repeat).

programme.title: What Comes Around
programme.desc: Eighteen-year-old Anna has an online boyfriend in Eric, who claims to be just a slightly older college student. But when they meet, he turns out to be twenty-eight, which disturbs Anna's mother Beth. But Anna is smitten and continues to see him, despite their age difference. But when Eric reveals his intentions and his past with Beth, the relationship turns into a dark game with Anna as the prize. (Repeat).

programme.title: Murder at Yellowstone City
programme.desc: A former slave who arrives in Yellowstone City, Montana, a desolate former boomtown now on the decline, looking for a place to call home. On that same day, a local prospector discovers gold - and is murdered. (Repeat).

programme.title: Muzzle
programme.desc: When LAPD K-9 officer Jake Rosser's dog Ace is killed in a Skid Row shootout, Rosser vows to get to the bottom of the killing. This results in him being taken off the force and blocked by Internal Affairs, who are at the root of a conspiracy. Determined not to give up, Jake teams up with a new partner - the titanium-toothed Socks - a violent K-9 with an unknown past. Together, the two work to break up the conspiracy, get to those behind it, and, most importantly, exact revenge for Ace's death. (Repeat).

programme.title: Barbarians
programme.desc: A civilized dinner party in a country house sees four friends, Lucas, Adam, Chloe, and Eve, coming together for a birthday celebration. As the night progresses secrets and lies force themselves into the light and polite pretensions are dropped. A knock at the door reveals three masked intruders with an agenda of their own. Will their friendship stand the test? Can they survive the night or will their secrets eventually catch up with them? (Repeat).

programme.title: Clean
programme.desc: A man living peacefully in self quarantine discovers a troubling spot. (Screamfest) (Repeat).

programme.title: No Way Up
programme.desc: Characters from very different backgrounds are thrown together when the plane they're travelling on crashes into the Pacific Ocean. When the airliner comes to rest perilously close to the edge of a ravine with the surviving passengers and crew trapped in an air pocket, a nightmare fight for survival ensues with the air supply running out and dangers creeping in from all sides. (Repeat).

Their dream dive turns deadly when a storm traps them inside the rusted wreck, surrounded by great white sharks. With air running out and nowhere to go, they wonder if they'll escape the watery tomb of the USS Charlotte. (New).

programme.desc: Rywalizacja w LaLiga kojarzona jest z walką dwóch futbolowych gigantów - Realu Madryt z FC Barceloną, w których składach występowali najwięksi piłkarze świata. Liga hiszpańska to nie tylko El Clasico.

programme.title: Paco Gento
programme.desc: Paco Gento to legendarny piłkarz Realu Madryt, który w ekipie Królewskich spędził blisko dwadzieścia lat. Przyczynił się do wywalczenia dwunastu tytułów mistrza kraju i sześciu Pucharów Europy.

programme.title: Miguel Soler
programme.desc: Niewielu hiszpańskich zawodników może pochwalić się tak bogatym i zarazem kontrowersyjnym CV, jak Miguel Soler. Piłkarz występował między innymi w RCD Espanyolu, FC Barcelonie i w Realu Madryt.

programme.title: Legendy LaLiga
programme.desc: Autorzy programu prezentują sylwetki najlepszych piłkarzy w historii Primera Division.
